channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Fitbit App Is Turning Into an AI-Powered Personal Health Coach
item.description: Built with Gemini, Google’s AI health coach will be everything but a doctor.

item.title: Starship launches could delay Florida flights up to 2 hours, FAA says
item.description: SpaceX's plans to launch Starship from Florida could have implications for the state's booming airports.

item.title: Device searches at the US border hit record high, new data shows
item.description: There have been more border device searches than ever before, per new data, despite the constitutionality of whether these searches are legal.

item.title: Nothing Beats Our Editors' Favorite Office Chair, and It’s on Sale Now
item.description: Looking for a new office chair? Branch is offering 10 percent off the base price of its chairs and accessories.

item.title: Best Student Discounts (2025): Laptops, Streaming Services, Shoes, and Software
item.description: That .edu email is your ticket to exclusive savings on laptops, streaming services, software, and more.

item.title: The PlayStation 5 Is About to Get More Expensive
item.description: Starting August 21 in the US, every edition will cost $50 more than it did the day before, thanks to Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: Google, sorry, but that Pixel event was a cringefest
item.description: Google's Pixel event was awkward and forced, underselling the technology it had on display.

item.title: Group14 lands $463M from SK, Porsche, and others to make silicon anodes for EVs
item.description: The battery materials startup raised significant Series D funding to expand its manufacturing capability. At the same time, it bought out partner SK's...

item.title: Do Large Language Models Dream of AI Agents?
item.description: For AI models, knowing what to remember might be as important as knowing what to forget. Welcome to the era of “sleeptime compute.”

item.title: India bans real-money gaming, threatening a $23 billion industry
item.description: India is set to ban real-money gaming nationwide under a proposed law that has just passed the lower house of parliament.
